thread.section_title: Mobile-Mate Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mobile-Mate | mobile-mate.com.au
thread.title: Ruth Cowley

author: Ruth Cowley
title: Ruth Cowley
text: Husband was set on me having a moto G4 plus phone. We could not find a white one,nor a 32 GB model here in Perth. So we ordered 2 of these from Mobile mate.So after paying for each on two separate occasions with PayPal,we waited just over a week for each,and they arrived in the mail,as expected. No problems.But was very annoyed that after going to all the trouble to answer this questionair,I could not submit this,without ticking the annoying and intrusive "please accept these terms and conditions" box. G
